# trotsky package

This is the main entry point for the Trotsky library.

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>

[StepActor](./trotsky.stepactor.md)


</td><td>

Represents a step for retrieving and handling an actor's profile using the Bluesky API.


</td></tr>

<tr><td>

[StepActorFollowers](./trotsky.stepactorfollowers.md)


</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[StepActorFollowings](./trotsky.stepactorfollowings.md)


</td><td>

Represents a step for retrieving an actor's followings using the Bluesky API. Supports paginated retrieval of followings.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[StepActorLikes](./trotsky.stepactorlikes.md)
